description.message: Helps users access their web services while travelling outside mainland China.

support_checkbox_label.message: Yes, I want to support this software.

support_message_no.message:
You only need to enable this to support us. Nothing else.
We are not going to show ads to annoy you, you don't need to pay us for anything, and we don't want your donation.
For more information, please visit here.

support_message_yes.message:
Thank you! Your support is greatly appreciated!
This functionality is powered by VigLink.

mode_lite_description.message: Fast, but applicable to only <abbr title="Tudou, Xiami, Ku6 and Xunlei">few websites</abbr>.

mode_normal_description.message: Recommended. Applicable to the most websites.

mode_redirect_description.message: Slow, but compatible with other proxy settings.

help.message: For more information about different modes, you can read this.

feedback.message: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

rating.message: If you find this extension helpful, please help us to rate it.
